title: Game is laggy
body: Is it just me? Or is League impossible to play right now because of the lag? I don't think it's on my end as I have no trouble with anything else. Anyone else getting very bad lag the entire match?

replies.body: Is the lag pretty consistent or are you having spikes infrequently?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted matches so we can get an overview, and let me know the results!
